title: Trailblazer Honors
overview: Logo's fourth annual Trailblazer Honors event, previously known as Logo Trailblazer Honors is a one-hour annual event that celebrates leaders at the forefront of LGBTQ equality, will be held at Cathedral of Saint John the Divine in New York City, one of the first religious institutions in New York City to champion the causes of the LGBTQ community. . The 2017 honorees include Cyndi Lauper and the creators of "Will & Grace," Max Mutchnick and David Kohan.
